FLAME_BURST.name: Flame Burst
FLAME_BURST.description: Deals fire damage to opponent with chance to burn

FIRE_WALL.name: Fire Wall
FIRE_WALL.description: Creates a wall of fire that damages attackers for 2 turns

INFERNO.name: Inferno
INFERNO.description: Massive fire damage to all opponents with high burn chance

EMBER_STRIKE.name: Ember Strike
EMBER_STRIKE.description: Quick fire attack with high critical chance

BLAZING_CHARGE.name: Blazing Charge
BLAZING_CHARGE.description: Charges forward with intense flames, dealing damage and increasing user's speed

VOLCANIC_ERUPTION.name: Volcanic Eruption
VOLCANIC_ERUPTION.description: Unleashes devastating volcanic power on all enemies with guaranteed burn

PHOENIX_FLAME.name: Phoenix Flame
PHOENIX_FLAME.description: Sacrifices HP to deal massive damage and heal 50% of damage dealt

SOLAR_FLARE.name: Solar Flare
SOLAR_FLARE.description: Unleashes star-level heat that burns all enemies for 3 turns and reduces their defense

BIG_BANG.name: Big Bang
BIG_BANG.description: Recreates the primordial explosion, dealing catastrophic damage to all enemies

SUPERNOVA.name: Supernova
SUPERNOVA.description: Triggers stellar collapse, obliterating enemies and healing team based on damage dealt

WATER_SHIELD.name: Water Shield
WATER_SHIELD.description: Creates a protective water barrier that reduces damage

TIDAL_WAVE.name: Tidal Wave
TIDAL_WAVE.description: Powerful water attack that may stun the opponent

WHIRLPOOL.name: Whirlpool
WHIRLPOOL.description: Traps enemy in swirling water, dealing damage over time and reducing accuracy

ABYSSAL_CALL.name: Abyssal Call
ABYSSAL_CALL.description: Summons deep sea pressure to crush enemies and lower their defense

TSUNAMI.name: Tsunami
TSUNAMI.description: Massive wave that deals damage to all enemies and has high stun chance

OCEAN_DEPTHS.name: Ocean Depths
OCEAN_DEPTHS.description: Summons pressure from the deepest trenches, permanently reducing enemy attack power

POSEIDON_TRIDENT.name: Poseidon's Trident
POSEIDON_TRIDENT.description: Calls upon the sea god's power to strike all enemies and heal team to full health

ABYSSAL_MAELSTROM.name: Abyssal Maelstrom
ABYSSAL_MAELSTROM.description: Creates a vortex to the ocean floor that swallows enemies whole

EARTH_SLAM.name: Earth Slam
EARTH_SLAM.description: Powerful ground attack that may lower defense

EARTHQUAKE.name: Earthquake
EARTHQUAKE.description: Damages all opponents with chance to stun

PETRIFY.name: Petrify
PETRIFY.description: Turns enemy to stone, stunning them for 1-2 turns

MOUNTAIN_CRASH.name: Mountain Crash
MOUNTAIN_CRASH.description: Summons mountain fragments to crash down on all enemies

TERRAFORM.name: Terraform
TERRAFORM.description: Reshapes battlefield to heal team and boost defense for 3 turns

CONTINENTAL_DRIFT.name: Continental Drift
CONTINENTAL_DRIFT.description: Shifts tectonic plates to create impassable barriers and damage all enemies

WORLD_SMASHER.name: World Smasher
WORLD_SMASHER.description: Channels the planet's core energy to unleash catastrophic seismic waves

GAIA_WRATH.name: Gaia's Wrath
GAIA_WRATH.description: Awakens the spirit of the Earth to judge enemies with permanent stat reduction

AIR_SLASH.name: Air Slash
AIR_SLASH.description: Fast wind-based attack with high critical chance

GUST.name: Gust
GUST.description: Pushes opponent back, delaying their turn

CYCLONE.name: Cyclone
CYCLONE.description: Traps opponent in a damaging whirlwind for 2 turns

SONIC_BOOM.name: Sonic Boom
SONIC_BOOM.description: Sound-based attack that ignores some defense

TORNADO.name: Tornado
TORNADO.description: Creates massive tornado that damages all enemies and reduces their accuracy

ZEPHYR_DANCE.name: Zephyr Dance
ZEPHYR_DANCE.description: User becomes ethereal, dodging attacks and countering with wind blades

HURRICANE.name: Hurricane
HURRICANE.description: Unleashes catastrophic winds that deal massive damage and may confuse enemies

ATMOSPHERIC_COLLAPSE.name: Atmospheric Collapse
ATMOSPHERIC_COLLAPSE.description: Removes air from battlefield, suffocating enemies and preventing them from using air abilities

TYPHOON_FURY.name: Typhoon Fury
TYPHOON_FURY.description: Creates multiple simultaneous tornadoes that deal escalating damage over 3 turns

SKY_GOD_ASCENSION.name: Sky God Ascension
SKY_GOD_ASCENSION.description: Transforms user into wind deity form, granting permanent evasion and critical chance

DIVINE_PROTECTION.name: Divine Protection
DIVINE_PROTECTION.description: Reduces damage taken for a turn

HOLY_STRIKE.name: Holy Strike
HOLY_STRIKE.description: Holy damage that is strong against dark types

PURIFY.name: Purify
PURIFY.description: Removes negative status effects from your team

RADIANT_BEAM.name: Radiant Beam
RADIANT_BEAM.description: Fires concentrated light that pierces through enemy defenses

ANGELIC_BLESSING.name: Angelic Blessing
ANGELIC_BLESSING.description: Fully heals team and provides damage immunity for one turn

DIVINE_JUDGMENT.name: Divine Judgment
DIVINE_JUDGMENT.description: Calls upon divine power to smite enemies with guaranteed critical hit

HEAVENS_GATE.name: Heaven's Gate
HEAVENS_GATE.description: Opens celestial portal that resurrects fallen allies and boosts all stats

ARCHANGEL_WRATH.name: Archangel's Wrath
ARCHANGEL_WRATH.description: Summons celestial warriors to purge enemies with holy fire

DIVINE_INTERVENTION.name: Divine Intervention
DIVINE_INTERVENTION.description: Direct godly intervention that instantly defeats one enemy and fully heals team

SHADOW_CLAW.name: Shadow Claw
SHADOW_CLAW.description: Quick dark attack with high critical chance

NIGHTMARE.name: Nightmare
NIGHTMARE.description: Puts opponent to sleep for 1-2 turns

SOUL_DRAIN.name: Soul Drain
SOUL_DRAIN.description: Steals health from opponent and heals user

SHADOW_WALK.name: Shadow Walk
SHADOW_WALK.description: User becomes invisible, guaranteeing next attack to be critical

VOID_BLAST.name: Void Blast
VOID_BLAST.description: Unleashes void energy that deals damage based on enemy's missing HP

ABYSSAL_RIFT.name: Abyssal Rift
ABYSSAL_RIFT.description: Opens a rift to the abyss, dealing massive damage and applying random debuffs

ETERNAL_DARKNESS.name: Eternal Darkness
ETERNAL_DARKNESS.description: Plunges battlefield into permanent darkness, reducing enemy accuracy and healing

DEMON_LORDS_EMBRACE.name: Demon Lord's Embrace
DEMON_LORDS_EMBRACE.description: Summons infernal powers to corrupt enemies, turning their healing into damage

APOCALYPSE.name: Apocalypse
APOCALYPSE.description: Unleashes end-of-days scenario that deals increasing damage as allies fall
